scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary cradling the Christ Child, seated in a lush green landscape. To the left, a man in a blue tunic and hat leads a horse to a trough of water, accompanied by two winged cherubic figures. One cherub holds a golden bucket, while the other appears to be assisting with the horse. In the background, a winding river flows past a walled city with towers and a castle, nestled amidst rolling hills and rocky outcrops. Two winged figures are depicted in the sky above. The overall scene evokes a sense of peaceful journey and divine protection.
